text: .@ZetechUni explains how Huawei #ICTAcademy has helped shift its BSc in IT online during #COVID19 & create industry-ready graduates with Routing & Switching certification. #HuaweiBlog #TECH4ALL
#COVID19 has pressed the pause button on education. Here's how #cloud has stepped in to ensure continuity for students. #Education4ALL #WinWin

How has #COVID19 impacted the @EU_Commission’s Work Programme and industrial strategy, and what is the role of #ICT in Europe’s future strategy? @EURACTIV’s online debate is about to start. Tune in to find out:

What are the challenges and opportunities brought about by the current global pandemic? @Huawei_ME VP of Public Relations Li Xiangyu (Spacelee) gives an insight into how #Huawei has been helping people stay connected during these trying times. #HuaweiFacts

The #5GBetterWorld Summit provided a great insight into the development of ICT infrastructure. How does #Huawei aim to help countries worldwide to win the battle against #COVID19 and restore normalcy? Download our new white paper to find out: https://tinyurl.com/y7fbvw7p

#DYK that media often confuse backdoor and vulnerability? So, what’s the difference? Join us as we play an experimental game to separate fact from fiction. We made things easy to understand for you in Episode 2 of Myths Unmasked. Check it out. #MythBuster #TrustInTech

There is a bright light at the end of the COVID-19 tunnel. From collaboration across borders to learning to adapt to a new normal, #Huawei Deputy Chairman @KenHu68 explains why working with technology, the world is stronger together. #HuaweiFacts
Education expert & #SmartBus partner Janice Richardson explains the multi-stakeholder approaches needed to keep children safe online & how initiatives like SmartBus can help. #HuaweiBlog
The latest blog from Huawei USA's Michael Dortch on Huawei's #AI capabilities, its application fighting the pandemic & the Connectivity, #COVID19 & Community webinar on April 29. #HuaweiBlog
What lessons can we learn from the pandemic about adapting to technology and trusting technology in the future? Watch the video for the answers: https://youtu.be/TfwmKwNh7uQ #TrustInTech

What are some of the main technologies that have been applied in the fight against the pandemic? And what is the key role of the carrier business sector during this time? Watch the video to find out: https://youtu.be/TfwmKwNh7uQ #TrustInTech

#DYK that not everything you hear is true? It’s easy to get lost in lies when searching for the truth. Even ice cream has been blamed for rising crime rates in summer. Watch Episode 1 of Myths Unmasked to see how you can avoid being fooled by conspiracies. #TrustInTech

The pandemic changed the way we live, work & learn. How have #ICT infrastructures coped & how is #tech helping us? #Huawei CNBG CMO Bob Cai explains & introduces the Technology against Pandemic: Insights and Practice on Telecom Networks White Paper. #TrustInTech #5GBetterWorld

Huawei is releasing its white paper on the current global pandemic today. Why? We will invite #Huawei Carrier Network Business Group Chief Marketing Officer Bob Cai to answer this question and highlight the key takeaways. Stay tuned to learn more. #HuaweiNews #TrustInTech

In China’s Henan province, #telemedicine is helping doctors to reach rural communities, detect the virus remotely, and keep people & healthcare workers safe by reducing travel & contact. #TECH4ALL https://tinyurl.com/y975ahhs

#Thanks to many community service workers, #Huawei employees at the Xi’an Research Center have returned to work safely. Watch to see how the arrival of spring has brought a fresh sense of optimism, as we can continue supporting our customers and clients. #HuaweiNow

Children may be afraid of masks or wear masks improperly. Here are the instructions of how our employee Victor Campo helps his children to wear their masks. Check out the video : https://youtu.be/cuG84XUN1sg

Putting on a mask before going to work is the new normal now. What else is new in your life? Here’s a #vlog, featuring a day in the #life of a #Huawei employee. How different is it to yours? Share with us in the comments. #HuaweiNow
Do you know how to wear a #mask properly? Watch the video to see #Huawei employee Victor Campo teach his #family the top tips, so you and your loved ones can stay #healthy. #HuaweiNow

#Huawei Deputy Chairman @KenHu68 announces the company’s partnership with #UNESCO Global Education Coalition to facilitate inclusive learning opportunities during this period of disruption caused by #COVID19. Let's stay healthy, connected & educated.

#Huawei Consumer Business Group saw revenue grow in the first quarter and CBG CEO Richard Yu is confident the company will see further growth for the whole year, despite the challenges of COVID-19 and U.S. sanctions. #HuaweiNews

Our Webinar for Online Higher Education unites #UNESCO experts, uni professors & #Huawei ICT experts to discuss best practices for mitigating the impact of #COVID19 on education. Watch it live at 4-6pm (GMT+8) on April 11. #LearningNeverStops #TECH4ALL https://tinyurl.com/uy9ygjz
#Huawei Italy employees are #WFH, but they still #stayconnected. No matter where and how you are, Huawei will always be with you, helping you to stay in touch. #HuaweiNow

#WFH is now the new normal for many employees at #Huawei Spain. How are people reinventing their daily routines and spending time with #family? Watch this #WhoAreWe video for inspirations. #WorkLifeBalance

Deputy Director of the Government Services Data Bureau of Shenzhen Municipality Wang Yaowen spoke of the importance of data in pandemic prevention and treatment during #Huawei Developer Conference 2020. Watch the replay: https://tinyurl.com/veprvwu #HDC2020
Despite a global pandemic, #Huawei has resumed more than 90% of its production & development operations, and kept supply chains intact by providing its partners with protective gear. #HuaweiNews
#Huawei Cloud’s ModelArts #AI platform might be the doctor's strongest ally in diagnosing COVID-19. Find out how it's saving time and lives: https://tinyurl.com/tcz2cg5

We continue to help countries in their fight against #COVID19 — most recently by donating protective equipment and tech solutions to support Italy’s emergency procedures. #HuaweiNews https://tinyurl.com/rsjxjp8

How much risk does #5G pose to human health? The International Commission on Non‐Ionizing Radiation Protection announces new guidelines, stating that extensive research has found 5G is safe for the public. #HuaweiNews

#Huawei’s Telemedicine Solution is helping Thailand in its fight against COVID-19. The platform enables remote online consultations and monitoring of patients on smart devices, improving the efficiency and effectiveness of diagnosis and treatment. #HuaweiNews
Find out how #ICT is playing a key role in healthcare, education & business to reduce the impact of #COVID19 on life & work. #Coronavirus #HuaweiBlog
Choosing a smart #datacenter power solution can boost growth, safety & lower costs. Read how. #FusionPower #HuaweiBlog #AI

#Cybersecurity & user #privacy are Huawei's top priorities. Remarks by US officials ignore huge investments & safety measures Huawei has developed to manage risks. If the US has evidence of violations, they should disclose it, instead of using the media to spread rumors. (6/6)

How does Huawei keep customer #data safe? How can we play our part in and understand more about cybersecurity? Petr Mrkvica, #Security Director at Huawei Prague, unlocks the answers with practical advice and tips in this #WhoAreWe video. #cybersecurity
